By specifying the date, I ensured that the match results are up-to-date and relevant to my friend's request. This API call allows me to retrieve the daily match results for football from the past week, including details about the home and away teams, the scores, and the tournament they belong to. This information will help me create a comprehensive list of daily match results for my friend, making the surprise even more exciting.

function.name: daily_match_list_scheduled_for_football_data
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Daily match list including scheduled matches.

The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days."

date.description: The date of the matches. The format is {dd/mm/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

function.name: match_boxscore_for_football_data
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Live, detailed team and player statistics.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Football Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

P.S.
Full"

function.name: tournament_info_for_football_data
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Current season, stage structure(divisions,conferences etc.), country and many more information about a tournament."

function.name: tournament_standings_for_football_data
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Team Rankings for a specific competition."

function.name: daily_match_list_results_for_football_data
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Daily match list including finished matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**"

date.description: The date of matches. The format is {dd/mm/yyyy}. Match list data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

function.name: match_team_statistics_for_football_data

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Football Match List or Fixture endpoints.**"

function.name: tournament_teams_for_football_data
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "football_data", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List of teams participating in a specific tournament."

function.name: match_play_by_play_for_football_data

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: My friend is a huge football fan and I want to surprise him with some interesting football facts. Can you provide me with a list of daily match results from the past week? Additionally, I would like to know the tournament details and participating teams.
